attributes.additional_details: it's about time that this country stopped being so lenient and soft, a soldier is murdered on the streets of London in cold blood, is that not treason?. he was a member of the crown in his job. Does the penalty for treason still carry the death penalty in this country?. why should the tax payer pay for these people to be imprisoned for 25 years. lethal injection I believe is the best thing in a case like this. cold blooded murder. The laws in this country are far to soft and lenient.
